entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.9°C

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness this afternoon. 30 percent chance of flurries near the British Columbia border late this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 50 km/h gusting to 80 this morning. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Clearing late this evening. 30 percent chance of flurries near the British Columbia border early this evening. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 2.
